articles.title: New dashboard page
articles.desc: The dashboard page has been reworked to include tips for new users and to better monitor your campaigns.

articles.title: Google and Microsoft accounts
articles.desc: The sending of emails with Google and Microsoft accounts has been reworked to better match their new protocols. The same has also been done for the connection to the bounce address.

articles.title: AcyMailing watermark removal
articles.desc: You can now remove the Built with AcyMailing logo in the unsubscribe page.

articles.title: AcyChecker integration
articles.desc: The integration with AcyChecker has been updated for compatibility with the version 1.5.0.

articles.title: Week number in emails
articles.desc: It is now possible to dynamically insert the week number and the year in an email.

articles.title: Better deliverability
articles.desc: The List-Unsubscribe header has been activated by default to improve deliverability. This leads to lower complaints from users struggling to find the unsubscribe link.

articles.title: Better EasyBlog images handling
articles.desc: We now have a better handling of EasyBlog images in case they were already existing from a previous post.

articles.title: Optimised HikaShop filter
articles.desc: The filter on HikaShop purchases has been optimised to improve the performance in the automations and segments.

articles.title: Improved Joomla SEF links
articles.desc: We added a security when trying to generate the SEF version of a link, in case Joomla fails to generate it.

articles.title: Advanced Custom Fields Pro
articles.desc: It is now possible to use our ACF integration with their pro version.

articles.title: Improved WordPress multisite integration
articles.desc: The installation on a single site of a WordPress multisite will no longer install AcyMailing on all network websites.

articles.title: WooCommerce last purchased products
articles.desc: The last purchased products are now correctly found and inserted in emails.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Vulnerability patch
articles.desc: We patched a vulnerability on welcome emails creation. More details available on our changelog page.

articles.title: Inactive lists
articles.desc: Inactive lists won't appear in the recipients section anymore.

articles.title: User data export and deletion
articles.desc: We fixed an issue with the GDPR options (user data export and deletion) regarding custom fields.

articles.title: Custom bounce email address
articles.desc: The bounce email address in the mail settings will now correctly be used over the bounce email address in the configuration.

articles.title: Scenario creation
articles.desc: The creation of a new scenario has been fixed.
